summary: Tired of being taken for granted by his wife and 3 daughters, Rodolfo Guerra wakes up one morning and decides not to go to work. Then the craziness begins.
cast: Jesús Ochoa|Carmen Beato|Diana García|Giovana Fuentes|Giovanna Zacarías|Camila Risser|Martín Altomaro|Norma Angélica|Veronica Aranda|Fernanda Borches|Julio Bracho|Julio Casado|Patricio Castillo|Angel Cerlo|Alejandro Cuétara|Fernando del Paso|Elia Domensain|Samara Evangelista|Veronica Falcón|Rodrigo Franco|Lisardo Guarinos|Álvaro Guerrero|Plutarco Haza|Adriana Hernandez|Maria Jiminez|Paco Lozano|Tere Monroy|Yadira Pascault Orozco|Natalia Vivas Paredes|Jorge Ponti|Sophia Rangel|Xochiquetzal Rodríguez|Arnulfo Reyes Sanchez|Carla Sneider|Daniel Sneider|Bárbara Torres|Maria Fernanda Torres|Vicente Torres|Hector Villareal|Luis Fernando Zarate
title: Aquí entre nos
